interface.name: cups_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute cups in the cups domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: cups_stream_connect
interface.summary: Connect to cupsd over an unix domain stream socket.

interface.name: cups_dbus_chat
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from cups over dbus.

interface.name: cups_domtrans_config
interface.summary: Execute cups_config in the cups_config domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: cups_signal_config
interface.summary: Send generic signals to the cups configuration daemon.

interface.name: cups_dbus_chat_config
interface.summary: Send and receive messages from cupsd_config over dbus.

interface.name: cups_stream_connect_ptal
interface.summary: Connect to ptal over an unix domain stream socket.
